WorkItem.Description:
this is getting on my nerves. i've added the trinkets from wowhead.com and eu.wowarmory.com but im facing some problems.
 
illustration of the dragon soul: doesnt show on the drop down menu altho i can see it in "tools>edit items"
flare of the heavens: tool tip and proc are wrong (making all the calculations wrong) altho i tried to fix it in "tools>edit items"
 
i know wowhead is screwed up atm but armory should be accurate. please help

Comments.Message: Can you clarify more? We don't understand what your issue is. What model are you using, as well?
i was able to solve both issues, thanx anyway.
